title: Escape from Uganda (2013)
overview: Escape from Uganda is a 2013 Malayalam thriller film based on a true life incident. The film is about a family who gets trapped in the Uganda.
storyline: A woman gets framed for a crime that she didn't commit. And it is up to her husband to save her from the notorious Uganadan prison.
plot: Shikha Samuel (Rima Kallingal), along with her husband Jayakrishnan (Vijay Babu), has chosen of all places in the world, Uganda, to find refuge in, after her family in Kerala objects to their marriage. The couple is leading a happy life with a girl child of their own. Jayakrishnan is employed as a manager in a coffee shop and Shikha runs a designer boutique of her own. She soon sets up a boutique of her own in the African country. The tranquillity of their life is shattered when Shikha is arrested on the charges of committing two murders, one of the victim is the daughter of the local Mayor, who has pledged to keep her in jail for the rest of her life.
